name: Download Files Below www
short_description:
you may have any file name {FN} and file type {FT} ... 
{DOM} = test.com
(DOMLN} is any directory from 1 to 99999 - ("downloaded_it_from_1 ... 99999" or the default: "fdnld_1 ... 99999}
using the structure name of "{FN}[{DFNumber}, {file_id}, any_file_source, any_original_id, any_date].{FT}

Cpanel ... Place files below the www (example: net/filog/{DOM}/(DOMLN} instead of net/filog/{DOM}/www/(DOMLN})
then place your files at "net/fillog/{DOM}/(DOMLN}".
in config.php, location="net/fillog/{DOM}/(DOMLN}" or net/fillog/{DOM}/(DOMLN}"

NO Cpanel: point your domain to "net/fillog/adom/{DOM}/storage/www" 
then place your files at "net/fillog/adom/{DOM}/storage/(DOMLN}".

in config.php, location="net/fillog/adom/{DOM}/storage/(DOMLN}"

in a html page place a anchor www.test.com/fdl.php?dir=1,id=36 ... 
calling fdl.php looking a file with the id of 36 in the {DFN} 1 ... 
"net/filog/test/(DOMLN}/AFile[1,36,o,1,20130201].doc sending as AFile[36].doc
